RefCode_sourceStmt: SELECT REPLACE(ReferenceCode,'FT','') as TxID FROM {sourceSchema}.{sourceTable} WHERE ReferenceType = '{optparam_0}' AND BusinessUnit IN ('CDRG','PALA') AND AccountingDate = '{optparam_1}' GROUP BY ReferenceCode ORDER BY 1

purgeStmt: DELETE from {targetSchema}.{targetTable} WHERE AsOfDateTime < '{cli_asod}' AND AccountingDate = '{optparam_1}'
target.targetColumns: ClearedDate, CloseLeg, CloseDate, Quantity, QuantityType, SettleDate, TransactionTypeCode, TransactionId, AccountingDate, AsOfDateTime
